title.native: Once Upon a Time in London

directors.name: Simon Rumley
directors.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: In the 1930s, organized crime came to England. The Italian Sabinis and English White family in West End dominated the London underworld. Come WWII and Jack "Spot" took over and later Billy Hill.
